google_source: Based on real Google Maps reviews via mojastoritev.si

reviews.author: Mateja
reviews.text_si: Odlična pralnica, zelo čisto in stroji delujejo perfektno. Priporočam!
reviews.text_en: Excellent laundromat, very clean and machines work perfectly. Highly recommend!

reviews.author: Luka
reviews.text_si: Sušilni stroj je super hitro posušil mojo debelo odejo. Zelo zadovoljen.
reviews.text_en: The dryer dried my thick blanket super fast. Very satisfied.

reviews.author: Eva
reviews.text_si: Priročna lokacija in všeč mi je da je 24/7 odprto.
reviews.text_en: Convenient location and I like that it's open 24/7.

reviews.author: Janez
reviews.text_si: Odlično za velike stvari kot so zavese in posteljnina. Stroji so zmogljivi.
reviews.text_en: Excellent for large items like curtains and bedding. Machines are powerful.

reviews.author: Tina
reviews.text_si: Čista pralnica, vse deluje brezhibno. Prihranim veliko časa.
reviews.text_en: Clean laundry, everything works flawlessly. Save a lot of time.

reviews.author: Aleš
reviews.text_si: Dobre cene in kvalitetno pranje. Manjka mi samo brezstično plačilo.
reviews.text_en: Good prices and quality washing. I just miss contactless payment.

reviews.author: Marko
reviews.text_si: Super, lahko na enkrat posušiš in opereš 20 kg
reviews.text_en: Great, you can wash and dry 20 kg at once

reviews.author: Ana
reviews.text_si: Ponavadi perem in sušim 2x2m sedežne prevleke. Brez zapletov. Priporočam.
reviews.text_en: I usually wash and dry 2x2m seat covers. No complications. Highly recommend.

reviews.author: David
reviews.text_si: Imel sem težavo z žetoni in lastnik je takoj prišel in uredil mojo težavo.
reviews.text_en: I had an issue with the coins and the owner came and sorted out my issue.

reviews.author: Michael
reviews.text_si: Res najboljše mesto za pranje in sušenje v Ljubljani. Preizkusil sem vse, ta je 4.8/5 po mojem mnenju.
reviews.text_en: Really the best wash & dry place in Ljubljana. Have tried them all, this one is 4.8/5 in my opinion.

reviews.author: Nina
reviews.text_si: Je čisto. Jaz hodim v pralnico samo za sušenje perila.
reviews.text_en: It's clean. I only go to the laundry for drying clothes.

reviews.author: Sarah
reviews.text_si: Čist prostor, z lepim vonjem mehčalca. Učinkovite naprave.
reviews.text_en: Clean space, with nice fabric softener smell. Efficient devices.
